scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:a11y: playwright test test/accessibility; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:a11y: playwright test test/accessibility; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:functional: playwright test test/functional; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:integration: playwright test test/integration; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:integration:real: USE_REAL_API=true playwright test test/integration; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:error-handling: playwright test test/error-handling; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:smoke: playwright test test/smoke; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:smoke:real: USE_REAL_API=true playwright test test/smoke; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:smoke: playwright test test/smoke; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:responsive: playwright test test/responsive; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:responsive: playwright test test/responsive; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:visual: playwright test test/visual; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:visual: playwright test test/visual; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:performance: playwright test test/performance/frontend-performance; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:performance:frontend: playwright test test/performance/frontend-performance; playwright show-report || true
scripts.test:e2e:performance:e2e: USE_REAL_API=true playwright test test/performance/e2e-performance; playwright show-report || true
scripts.lighthouse:ci:local: LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__CURRENT_HASH=local lhci autorun --collect.startServerCommand='npm run dev'; node scripts/display-lighthouse-links.js
